item.title: Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) System – (CDTI) Control Panel Except TCAS Function (STC ST01103SE) (EFB Not Installed)

numlitem.para: Flight ID can be set, and
Screen display is acceptable to flight crew.

placard.para: Placard ADS-B CDTI Control Panel "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
